channel.title: +Articles on कल्पान्तरे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +Articles on कल्पान्तरे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: shUdra-gotras
item.description: Gotra system of Śūdras as per Śeṣakṛṣṇa’s Śūdrācāraśiromaṇi - Using the name, of some popular person born in a good lineage, as the Gotra. or In case of being born from a duly wedded Dvija father & a Śūdra mother, using the Gotra of the father. or Using the Gotra of the Upadeśaka (instructor) Brāhmaṇa as one’s Gotra. or Using ‘Kāśyapa’ as the Gotra.
